short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Swap npm, yarn, pnpm & bower install links interchangeably on npmjs website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dependency Install Swapper is a convenient Chrome extension that allows you to quickly switch between different package managers (such as yarn, pnpm, npm, and bower) for all packages available on https://npmjs.com 

Simply select your preferred package manager, and the extension will automatically adjust the install command for all packages on the website. Additionally, the extension scans the package readme files for referenced install commands to determine if the package is a developer dependency or not, and updates the command accordingly.
